original_text: while I was still in prayer, Gabriel, the man I had seen in the earlier vision, came to me in swift flight about the time of the evening sacrifice.
korean_text: 곧 내가 기도할 때에 이전에 환상 중에 본 그 사람 가브리엘이 빨리 날아서 저녁 제사를 드릴 때 즈음에 내게 이르더니

sentences.original_text: while I was still in prayer
the man I had seen in the earlier vision
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이전 환상에서 보았던 그 사람

sentences.original_text: came to me in swift flight
about the time of the evening sacrifice
